content.text:
# 14th Filmfare Awards South

The 14th Filmfare Awards South Ceremony honoring the winners of the best of South Indian cinema in 1966 was an event held in 1967. The Malayalam films are added in this year.
Awards
{| class="wikitable" width=100% |
|-
! !  style="background:#eedd82; text-align:center; width:50%;"|Best Tamil Film
! !  style="background:#eedd82; text-align:center; width:50%;"|Best Telugu Film
|-
| valign="top" |
*Ramu - AVM Productions
| valign="top" |
*Aastiparulu - V. B. Rajendra Prasad
|-
! !  style="background:#eedd82; text-align:center; width:50%;"|Best Malayalam Film
|-
| valign="top" |
*Chemmeen - Hasam Ismail
|-
|}
Special Awards
{| class="wikitable" width=50% |
|-
! !  style="background:#eedd82; text-align:center; width:50%;"|Special Commendation Award for Performance
|-
| valign="top" |
*Jayalalithaa - Chandhrodhayam
|}
References
* Filmfare Magazine 1967.
General
